DOC.brief_summary: Comparison differential luminance sensitivity ( DLS ) value test point
DOC.criteria: physical , intellectual linguistic ability , order understand test requirement spherical ametropia max . ± 8 dpt , cylindrical ametropia max . ± 3 dpt distant visual acuity > 10/20 isocoria , pupil diameter > 3 mm pregnancy , nurse diabetic retinopathy asthma HIV+ AIDS history epilepsy significant psychiatric disease medication know effect visual field sensitivity acute ocular infection ( e.g . keratitis , conjunctivitis , uveitis ) severe dry eye miotic drug amblyopia squint nystagmus albinism keratoconus intraocular surgery ( except uncomplicated cataract surgery ) perform < 3 month prior screen history presence macular disease / macular edema relevant opacities central refractive medium ( cornea , lens , vitreous body ) ocular trauma
